item_desc_short_1:
Doubles the research EXP gained
after sleep research.�
item_desc_short_2:
Doubles the Dream Shards received
after sleep research.�
item_desc_short_3:
Doubles the EXP that helpers gain
after sleep research.�
item_desc_short_4:
Doubles the Energy that helpers
recover after sleep research.�
item_desc_short_5:
A specially made pillow that
restores 50 Energy to a single
helper Pokémon.�
item_desc_short_6:
An especially energizing whistle.
One blow, and you’ll get 3 hours’
worth of Berries and ingredients.�
item_desc_short_7:
A special ticket that lets you move
to another site at any time.�
item_desc_short_8:
Lets you borrow a Good Camp Set
for seven days to aid your research
and help you raise Snorlax.�
item_desc_short_9:
A treat that will make a Pokémon
a little more friendly toward you.
Gives 1 friendship point.�
item_desc_1:
Doubles the research EXP gained
after sleep research. Good for one
sleep session, then consumed.�
item_desc_2:
Doubles the Dream Shards received
after sleep research. Good for one
sleep session, then consumed.�
item_desc_3:
Doubles the EXP that helpers gain
after sleep research. Good for one
sleep session, then consumed.�
item_desc_4:
Doubles the Energy that helpers
recover after sleep research. Good
for one sleep session, then consumed.�
item_desc_5:
A specially made pillow that restores
50 Energy to a single helper Pokémon.�
item_desc_6:
An especially energizing whistle.
One blow, and your team of helpers
will gather three hours’ worth of
Berries and ingredients for you.
This will not cause main skills
to trigger.�
item_desc_7:
A special ticket that lets you move
to another site at any time.
(You can only move to areas you have
already unlocked.)�
item_desc_8:
Lets you borrow a Good Camp Set
for seven days to aid your research
and help you raise Snorlax.�
item_desc_9:
A treat that will make a Pokémon a
little more friendly toward you. This
biscuit gives one friendship point.�
item_desc_10:
A nice treat that will make a Pokémon
quite a bit more friendly toward you.
This biscuit gives three friendship
points.�
item_desc_11:
A special treat that will make a
Pokémon as friendly as can be. This
biscuit maxes out friendship points.�
